document.discussion_title: ThinkLite Augments its Relationship with NuAge Energy Offering LED… | Live Featured
document.topic_text: Menu ThinkLite Augments its Relationship with NuAge Energy Offering LED… “ThinkLite’s unique value proposition is being able to provide highly efficient retrofits that involve minimal infrastructural changes to the current light fixtures.” Dinesh Wadhwani, ThinkLite CEO Natick, MA (PRWEB) August 17, 2016 ThinkLite LLC, a leading manufacturer of breakthrough commercial LED products and NuAge Energy, a provider of automated electrical and natural gas solutions, announced that they have augmented their relationship and are exhibiting together at the Channel Partners Evolution Conference in Washington, DC. ThinkLite products are available to businesses large and small through NuAge Energy representatives from coast to coast. “The lines are blurring when it comes to providing…
